events.text:
Oh heavens!!! Lady Rhiannon is blaming me for the sudden loss of her Master Tapes!
Please, show mercy, it wasn't me! I'm much too young to be sacrificed!
The unfair [color=#15b542]Lady[/color] won't hear anything I have to tell her...
Can I share my findings with you?

Thank you!!!!
Now I'm not sure if you've waltzed around this ghastly Fortress yet...
You may notice a host of Gargoyles have turned this place into their personal Tower of Babel...
With clashing temperaments the Gargoyles reign over this Fortress in complete disharmony.
If I were you I would seek out the [color=#ff99c9]Pretty[/color] and [color=#ee8434]Funky[/color] ones...
Avoid the others! They're useless brutes!
Maybe the [color=#ff99c9]Pretty[/color] and [color=#ee8434]Funky[/color] Gargoyles will have Lady Rhiannon[color=#15b542]'s[/color] Master Tapes?
